name: excalidraw
description: Excalidraw is an open-source virtual whiteboard for hand-drawn style diagrams, sketches, and collaboration. It supports real-time multi-user sessions, exports, and can be embedded or self-hosted as part of documentation or design workflows.
features: Hand-Drawn Style: Sketchy diagrams with personality. Unique visual appeal.
Real-Time Collaboration: Draw together with team members. Shared whiteboard experience.
Export Options: Save as PNG, SVG, or JSON. Flexible output formats.
Embeddable: Integrate into docs and websites. Versatile usage.
Infinite Canvas: Unlimited space for your ideas. Never run out of room.
Self-Hosted: Run your own whiteboard server. Complete control over diagrams.
